00070 struct IndexStatus {
00071   enum action_code {
00072     FileOpen,
00073     FileSkip,
00074     FileError,
00075     FileClose,
00076     DocumentCount
00077   };
00078 
00079   virtual void operator () ( int code, const std::string& documentPath, const std::string& error, int documentsIndexed, int documentsSeen ) {
00080     status( code, documentPath, error, documentsIndexed, documentsSeen );
00081   }
00082 
00083   virtual void status( int code, const std::string& documentPath, const std::string& error, int documentsIndexed, int documentsSeen ) {};
00084 };
00085
